When Nora takes the train from London to visit her sister in the countryside, she expects to find her waiting at the station, or at home cooking dinner. But when she walks into Rachelâ€™s familiar house, what she finds is entirely different: her sister has been the victim of a brutal murder.

Haunted by the murder and the secrets that surround it, Nora is under the harrow: distressed and in danger. As Noraâ€™s fear turns to obsession, she becomes as unrecognizable as the sister her investigation uncovers.
